rukus.text: 20|1|Tā hā.
20|2|Ware ga anata ni kuruān o kudashita no wa, anata o nayamasu tamede wanai.
20|3|Omo o osoreru mono e no, kunkai nihokanaranai.
20|4|Daichi to takai sho ten to o tsukuri nasa reru, kare kara kudasa reta keijidearu.
20|5|Jihibukaki okata wa, gyokuza ni chinza nasa reru.
20|6|Ten ni ari-chi ni aru mono, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono, mata, shimetta tsuchi no shita ni aru mono wa, subete kare no monodearu.
20|7|Tatoe anata ga ōgoe de hanashite mo (Sekiri naku), kare wa, hime rareta koto mo kakusa rete iru koto mo shitte ora reru.
20|8|Arrā, kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Mottomo utsukushī gyomei wa kare ni zokusuru.
20|9|Mūsā no monogatari ga, anata ni todoita ka.

20|10|Kare ga hi o mite, kazoku ni itta toki no koto o omoi nasai. `Tomare, watashi wa hi o mita. Tabun asoko kara, hi-wa o mochikaeru koto ga dekiyou. Aruiwa ano hi de, michibika reru kamo shirenai.'
20|11|Daga kare ga soko ni kita toki,-goe ga atte yoba reta. `Mūsā yo,
20|12|hontōni ware wa anata no omodearu. Dakara kutsu o nuge. Ima anata wa, towā no hijiridani ni iru nodearu.
20|13|Ware wa anata o eranda. Dakara (anata ni) keiji suru koto o kike.
20|14|Hontōni ware wa arrādearu. Ware no soto ni kami wanai. Dakara ware ni tsukae, ware o kokoro ni daite reihai no tsutome o mamore.
20|15|Tashikani (shūmatsu no)-ji wa kuru nodearuga, sore o himete okitai no wa, kakujin ga doryoku shita tokoro ni ōji, mukui o uke saseru tamedearu.
20|16|Dakara, kore o shinjinaide jibun no yokubō ni shitagau-sha-tachi kara tōzakari, anata o hametsu kara sukue.
20|17|Anata no migite ni aru soreha nanika, mūsā yo.'
20|18|Kare wa mōshiageta. `Kore wa tsuedesu. Watashi wa kore ni motare, mata hitsuji no tame ni kore de (konoha o) uchiotoshi, mata, sono soto no yō ni kyōshimasu.'
20|19|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Mūsā yo, sore o nage yo.'
20|20|Kare ga sore o nageta tokoro, sokuza ni soreha hebi ni natte, hai mawatta.
20|21|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Sore o osae yo. Osorete wa naranai. Ware wa sore o gen no yō ni kaesudearou.
20|22|Sorekara anata no te o, wakinoshita ni ire yo. Nani no sawari mo nai no ni, sore wa shiroku narou. Kore wa imahitotsu no shirushi.
20|23|Ware ga saidai no shirushi o, anata ni shimesu tamedearu.
20|24|Anata wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontōni kare wa kōman hidōdearu.'
